front.title: •Stalker
front.gametext: May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Probe droids deploy free to sites related to same system.
front.lore: Originally assigned to search the Outer Rim for new worlds to subjugate. Launched the probe droid that found Echo Base. Later reassigned to Death Squadron.

combo: Stalker + Imperial Helmsman Draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
